name: Le Domestique Baselayer - Extra Fine American Merino
description: Our goal was making a base layer that is second to none. It is incredibly soft, 100% Merino Wool (160gsm, 18.6 micron) from the USA. It is sewn in East Vancouver into a slim-fitting, elegant technical layer with clean lines. It is machine washable. It is cut longer in the back to work perfectly with your shorts, bibs and jerseys. This base layer wicks moisture, regulates body temperature, is odour resistant and will be your loyal companion on every ride. - Sewn in East Vancouver, Canada - Textile Made in the USA - Slim Fitting, Cycling Cut The cyclist shown in the photo is wearing a washed size small Measures: 182cm (6'), Chest: 92cm (36"), Waist: 74cm (29"), Bicep: 27cm (10.5") *Like a T-Shirt, slight shrinking will occur after the first wash. SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD for extended life. Machine Washable Cold. No Dryer.

name: The Arenberg Hoodie - Men's Merino Wool
description: Is there a darker, harder or more bone-chilling place in cycling than the Arenberg Forest? The phrase Hell of the North is most specifically talking about Arenberg. An area devastated in the Second World War, a hardened mining zone, and the icon of Paris-Roubaix. When the trees sway in the forest winds, whispers of suffering are heard. The Arenberg hoodie is 400g/lfm 100% merino wool, keeping you warm and comfortable in cool and wet conditions. When the wind really blows, pull up the large hood and hunker down. A Jacket designed with April in mind, whether it's at Roubaix, Ardenees week or your local ride. PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jacket Weight = 425g (M) - 100% Merino Wool - YKK Reverse Coil Zipper with Vintage Pull - Cycling Cut - Longer in Back - Randonneur side-zip pocket - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: The Londonderry Hoodie - Womens Merino Wool
description: With a pistol, a racing bike and bloomers Annie Londonderry was the first women to ride around the globe in 1895. Shortly after struggling from New York to Chicago, Londonderry tossed her ladies bike and skirts to the curb, along with other heavy Victorian era baggage. She returned 15 months later, on a road bike, self described as a journalist and a 'new woman'. The Londonderry wool hoodie is the ideal second layer for cold rides, wearing around town or biking around the globe. It's a feminine, form-fitting cut and features a randonneur hybrid pocket which carries two tall cans standing inside the jacket. The hood is large to not be restrictive while fitting perfectly under a helmet. PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jacket Weight = 425g (M) - 100% Merino Wool - black - Cut Longer in Back - Randonneur hybrid pocket - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: Cima Coppi Track Jacket - European Merino Wool
description: A great second layer for winter weather and crisp mornings, the Team track jacket is also perfect for when you get cold after a long ascent or a hard effort at the track. Made from a heavier 360g/m 100% wool, this Jacket features embroidered logos, a zip randonneur pocket on the back and a high collar for keeping comfortable. PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jacket Weight = 450g (M) - 100% Merino Wool - YKK Reverse Coil Zipper with Vintage Pull - Cycling Cut - Longer in Back - Randonneur side-zip pocket - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: The Podium Jacket - Women's Merino Wool
description: The Podium Jacket is a women’s specific cut with very feminine lines and a simple understated approach to the extremely popular Track Jacket. Featuring a seamless randonneur pocket, full zipper and high collar it’s perfect for alpine riding and cold weather. It’s currently available in All Black or Grey. The jacket also features embroidered logos, a zip randonneur pocket on the back and a high collar for keeping comfortable. - 100% Merino Wool - Zip Randonneur pocket - YKK reverse coil zipper - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES *Jersey may very slightly from the image as each is handcut, and handmade to order. If you want minor customizations of this design, we do it, please inquire by email. HANDWASH COLD WATER - No Dryer. Track Jacket is pre-shrunk wool.

name: Cima Coppi Team Jersey - European Merino Wool
description: The new 2013 Team Jersey is our first full zip offering. The colours are changed for the new kit to something a little more striking, influenced by the tones found on evening mountain climbs, whether that's on the north shore, the Pyrenees or the Dolomites. Our most versatile jersey for all weather conditions. By incorporating a full zip we can stretch the functional temperature to even the hottest days. All our jerseys are quite light, made from ultra fine wool, which breathes excellently. For cold conditions this jersey should still be layered with arm warmers and a track jacket. OPTIONS AVAILABLE: - Men's or Women's cut, 6" zip PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jersey Weight = 325g (M, Short Sleeve) - 100% Wool - YKK Full Zip - Cut Longer in Back - Three Elasticized Jersey Pockets - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: Greg Cycling Jersey - European Merino Wool
description: The iconic Mondrian inspired colours that "LeMonster" rode to win the '86 tour have forever solidified their place in cycling history. The Greg jersey is our take on the classic in merino wool to celebrate the centenary of Le Tour. A design execution merging De Stijl styling with numerous panels allows us to use offcuts for construction. The jersey may take much longer to cut and sew, but it's worth it. Good for all conditions except the very cold when it should be layered with arm warmers and the track jacket. OPTIONS AVAILABLE: - Short Sleeve and Long Sleeve. PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jersey Weight = 321g (M, Short Sleeve) - 100% Merino Wool, Cut Longer in Back - YKK Full Zip - Three Elasticized Jersey Pockets - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: Fausto Cycling Jersey - European Merino Wool
description: The Northerners loved him and the Southerners jeered him. With Gino Bartali, the two men divided the nation, as both their careers were being divided by the great war. Both men enigmas within a Green, White and Red wrapping, with more controversy, heroics and intrigue than the tifosi could seem to tire of telling. A newly designed wool jersey for 2013. Good for all conditions except the very cold when it should be layered with arm warmers and the track jacket. OPTIONS AVAILABLE: - Short Sleeve and Long Sleeve. - Men's or Women's cut PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jersey Weight = 330g (M, Short Sleeve) - 100% Merino Wool - Cut Longer in Back - Three Elasticized Jersey Pockets - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: Bradley Cycling Jersey - European Merino Wool
description: Asymmetric design, asymmetric chainrings, asymmetric haircut for arguably Britain's greatest rider. You put Bradley on the time trial bike and he's one of the best, evolving from TT specialist to the first Brit to win the Tour de France. A mid-weight jersey good for all conditions. All our jerseys are quite light, made from ultra fine wool, which breathes excellently. For cold conditions, layering this jersey with arm warmers and a track jacket is ideal. OPTIONS AVAILABLE: - Short Sleeve and Long Sleeve. - Men's or Women's cut PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jersey Weight = 325g (M, Short Sleeve) - 100% Merino Wool - Cut Longer in Back - Three Elasticized Jersey Pockets - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: Federico Cycling Jersey - European Merino Wool
description: The Eagle of Toledo owns the '59 Tour, 9 King of the Mountains jerseys, and one of the most charming tales in cycling. Known as an ace climber but a timid descender, the story is told of him eating an ice cream at the mountain top to wait for others. True. Also true, was he needed assistance (for a broken wheel) and used the treat to calm down as he sat helpless on the roadside. A newly designed wool jersey for 2013. Good for all conditions except the very cold when it should be layered with arm warmers and the track jacket. OPTIONS AVAILABLE: - Short Sleeve and Long Sleeve. - Men's or Women's cut PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jersey Weight = 330g (M, Short Sleeve) - 100% Merino Wool - Cut Longer in Back - Three Elasticized Jersey Pockets - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: Bernard Cycling Jersey - European Merino Wool
description: From the land of the World's Biggest Races. The Blue, White and Red cascade through a long history of cycling greats. Across the wind-swept flats of Brittany, the Le Blaireau hammers headstrong into the gale. The Boss, Le Patron, always on the attack. One of our most popular mid-weight jerseys. Good for all conditions except the very cold when it should be layered with arm warmers and the track jacket. OPTIONS AVAILABLE: - Short Sleeve and Long Sleeve. - Men's or Women's cut PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jersey Weight = 330g (M, Short Sleeve) - 100% Merino Wool - Cut Longer in Back - Three Elasticized Jersey Pockets - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: Ryder Cycling Jersey - European Merino Wool
description: The lanky mountain goat, bobbing and chugging up the Stelvio, riding the others off his wheel. Seemingly awkward and out of place on the steep slopes, he's not. The tenacious Victoria-native dieseled his way to 2012 Giro d'Italia win. An updated jersey taking inspiration from years of Canadian National jerseys. Good for all conditions except the very cold when it should be layered with arm warmers and the track jacket. OPTIONS AVAILABLE: - Short Sleeve and Long Sleeve. - Men's or Women's cut PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jersey Weight = 325g (M, Short Sleeve) - 100% Merino Wool - YKK Full Zip - Cut Longer in Back - Three Elasticized Jersey Pockets - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada - Features embroidered Maple Leaf on the left shoulder SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: Eddy Cycling Jersey - European Merino Wool
description: Black. Yellow. Red. What colors roar more loudly throughout the history of cycling? While dirt, sweat and blood stain a narrow path along the sharp central ridge of the cobbles, ravenous, screaming fanatics line the gutters. Only a special breed of the bold and powerful survive Belgium, Eddy dominated it. One of our warmer mid-weight (305g) jerseys. All our jerseys are quite light, made from ultra fine wool, which breathes excellently. For cold conditions this jersey should still be layered with arm warmers and a track jacket. OPTIONS AVAILABLE: - Short Sleeve and Long Sleeve. - Men's or Women's cut PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jersey Weight = 305g (M, Short Sleeve) - 100% Merino Wool - Cut Longer in Back - Three Elasticized Jersey Pockets - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: Cima Coppi Reclaimed Wool Team Cycling Cap
description: This is the cap all our friends have been asking for. Co-designed with your feedback for our first collab item! The cap comes in the Cima Coppi team colours - black and cobalt, but also in our favorite reclaimed materials - both woven wool and knit merino. Embroidered on both sides with the Cima Coppi wordmark, and the logo offset to the side of the brim. Lastly, it features an elasticized back panel, so it's one-size-fits-all. 100% reclaimed wool. One Size fits 'all' (55-59cm) Note: We can adjust the elastic for smaller or larger heads, just email. SHIPPPING RATES

name: Fitted Wool Cycling Cap - Il Giro
description: Back by popular demand, our 100% wool Giro cap is available again. Made from super 120 Zegna wool, with a high visibility reflective pink stripe. Available fitted, or elasticized as a one-size fits most (55-59) SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES

name: Wool Cycling Cap - National Classic
description: A classic four panel cycling cap with national treatment of the Cima Coppi logo. Made from both Merino Knit and Super 100 woven wool, this cap will be warm even when it's wet, and is lightweight for all weather use. The knit wool has stretch and is made from the offcuts from our jersey production. Cycling caps are designed and cut to fit under a helmet perfectly. Handmade in Vancouver, Canada 100% Wool (50% Knit, 50% Woven*) Recycled PP Brim One Size Fits All (55cm - 61cm) SHIPPPING RATES *Can be made with 100% woven wool, or with another nation design by email request.

options.name: Plain Grey - One Size, Classic Cap

name: Wool Cycling Winter Cap with Merino Ear Flap
description: Same comfort and style as our classic cap plus a soft merino wool ear flap to keep you warm in the winter months. Made from both Merino Knit and light Super 100 woven wool, this cap will be warm even when it's wet. The knit wool has stretch and is made from the offcuts from our jersey production. The Super 100 woven wool is lightweight so that the cap fits perfectly under a helmet. Handmade in Vancouver, Canada 100% Wool (50% Knit, 50% Woven*) 100% Merino wool ear flap Recycled PP Brim One Size Fits All (55cm - 61cm) SHIPPPING RATES *Caps can be made with 100% woven wool by email request.

name: Team Arm Warmers - European Merino Wool
description: Wool arm warmers are an excellent way to get extra versatility out of your short sleeve jersey during spring, fall and winter riding. Made with silicon grippers at the top to keep them in place. Features our logo embroidered on one cuff. Handmade in Vancouver, Canada 100% Double Knit Merino Wool S, M, L SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES

name: Team Knee Warmers - European Merino Wool
description: Wool knee warmers fit perfectly under your shorts and cover from mid-thigh to mid-calf to keep legs and knees warm during spring, fall and winter riding. Made with silicon grippers at the top to keep them in place. Made with only one rear seam for comfort and features our logo embroidered on the rear left calf. Handmade in Vancouver, Canada 100% Double Knit Merino Wool XS, S, M, L, XL SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES

name: Sean Cycling Jersey - European Merino Wool
description: All Seasons. All Events. All Domination. The Sean Jersey. Nobody needed to ask or wonder if he was a classics "hardmen", as the muscles and veins in his legs read like a road map to kicking their ass. This ultrafine wool jersey is our lightest jersey and most suited for the hottest weather. The light colours won't absorb as much sun and the fine wool will breathe second to none. OPTIONS AVAILABLE: - Short Sleeve and Long Sleeve. - Men's or Women's cut PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jersey Weight = 250g (M, Short Sleeve) - 95% Merino Wool, 5% Nylon - Cut Longer in Back - Three Elasticized Jersey Pockets - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: Jan Cycling Jersey - European Merino Wool
description: A little something is missing from the peloton without that powerful deep pink. When Jan threw a leg over a TT bike, you knew something impressive was about to take place. Sheer power absolutely hammering the pedals, oddly gentle, in black and pink. One of our warmer merino wool jerseys ideal for cooler conditions when the black wool will absorb the sun. Great for fall and spring conditions. OPTIONS AVAILABLE: - Short Sleeve and Long Sleeve. - Men's or Women's cut PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS - Jersey Weight = 315g (M, Short Sleeve) - 100% Merino Wool - Cut Longer in Back - Three Elasticized Jersey Pockets - Handmade in East Vancouver, Canada SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES HANDWASH COLD WATER - NO Dryer.

name: Paris-Roubaix T-Shirt - Limited Edition Print
description: Typographic of the cobbled sectors of the 2012 Paris-Roubaix in order as they appear, in the shape of the Roubaix Cobble trophy. Roubaix is texture, order in chaos, and the minutiae of profile in an otherwise flat surface. Printed on American Apparel Slate Tees: SIZING CHART $2 of each shirt sold will go to Les Amis de Paris-Roubaix SHIPPPING RATES

name: Organic Velo T-Shirt - Limited Edition Print
description: A departure from the popular Robert Indiana "Love" postcard. Our tee uses negative space and strong bold colours from the biggest monuments in cycling to create an original interpretation on the classic "Love" design. **LIMITED QUANTITIES AVAILABLE (SOME SIZES SOLD OUT!) All shirts are unisex American Apparel and are perfect for either men or women. Women may want to size down one size. 100% Organic Fine Jersey Cotton Printed on American Apparel Sustainable Edition Durable Rib Neckband SIZING CHART SHIPPPING RATES
